TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 632
TEI.2.document_title: Ramon Musquiz to Alcalde of San Felipe, 03-29-1831

barker_notes.barker_summary: Ramon Musquiz to Alcalde of San Felipe de Austin, March 29, 1831. Reports to immigrants who passed Nacogdoches. If not members of Austin's colony, must be expelled. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 632

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Ramon Musquiz to Alcalde of San Felipe de Austin, March 29, 1831. Reports to immigrants who passed Nacogdoches. If not members of Austin's colony, must be expelled. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
